  (PackageClause 
    (PackageIdentifier "main")) 
  (FunctionDeclaration 
    (Block 
      (Statement 
        (SimpleStatement 
          (ShortVarDeclaration 
            (ExpressionList 
              (Expression 
                (Identifier "ctx"))) 
            (ExpressionList 
              (Expression 
                (UnaryExpression 
                  (Token) 
                  (Expression 
                    (CompositeLiteral 
                      (LiteralValue 
                        (KeyedElement 
                          (FieldIdentifier "Remote") 
                          (Expression 
                            (Identifier "remote")))) 
                      (TypeIdentifier "uploadContext")))))))))) 
    (Identifier "main") 
    (ParameterList)))
